```js
class MenuExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { open: false, selected: undefined };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <div style={{ position: "relative", height: 64 }}>
          <MenuAnchor style={{ position: "absolute" }}>
            <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ open: true })}>
              Open menu
            </Button>
            <Menu
              open={this.state.open}
              onCancel={() => this.setState({ open: false })}
              onSelected={selected => this.setState({ selected, open: false })}
            >
              <MenuItem>Item 1</MenuItem>
              <MenuItem>Item 2</MenuItem>
              <MenuDivider />
              <MenuItem>Item 3</MenuItem>
              <MenuItem disabled>Item 4 is disabled</MenuItem>
            </Menu>
          </MenuAnchor>
        </div>
        <p>
          Selected index:{" "}
          {this.state.selected === undefined ? "none" : this.state.selected}
        </p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<MenuExample />;
```

Example with icons:

```js
class IconMenuExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { open: false, selected: undefined };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <div style={{ position: "relative", height: 64 }}>
          <MenuAnchor style={{ position: "absolute" }}>
            <Button onClick={() => this.setState({ open: true })}>
              Open menu
            </Button>
            <Menu
              open={this.state.open}
              onCancel={() => this.setState({ open: false })}
              onSelected={selected => this.setState({ selected, open: false })}
              icons
            >
              <MenuItem icon={<Icon>done</Icon>}>Item 1</MenuItem>
              <MenuItem>Item 2</MenuItem>
              <MenuItem icon={<Icon>check_circle</Icon>}>Item 3</MenuItem>
            </Menu>
          </MenuAnchor>
        </div>
        <p>
          Selected index:{" "}
          {this.state.selected === undefined ? "none" : this.state.selected}
        </p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<IconMenuExample />;
```
